code: import React from'react';import{Provider}from'react-redux';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Route}from'react-router-dom';import Platform from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Platform";import AppState from"./src/components/AppState";import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import reducer from"./src/reducers";import{loadState,saveState}from"./src/localStorage";import throttle from'lodash/throttle';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import mainSaga from"./src/sagas";var persistedState=loadState();var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var store=createStore(reducer,persistedState,applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware));sagaMiddleware.run(mainSaga);store.subscribe(throttle(function(){saveState(store.getState());}),1000);var instructions=Platform.select({ios:"Press Cmd+R to reload,\nCmd+D or shake for dev menu",android:"Double tap R on your keyboard to reload,\nShake or press menu button for dev menu"});var App=function App(){return React.createElement(Provider,{store:store},React.createElement(AppState,null));};export default App;
